mapper.insert: insert into bus(bus_num, member_num, bus_region, bus_start_date, bus_people) values(#{busNum}, #{memberNum}, #{busRegion}, #{busStartDate}, #{busPeople})
mapper.select: select * from bus where bus_num = #{busNum} and member_num = #{memberNum}
mapper.update: update bus set bus_cancel = #{busCancel} where bus_num = #{busNum} and member_num = #{memberNum}
update bus_info set bus_people_limit = #{busPeopleLimit} where bus_num = #{busNum}
